Posts.Content: Thank you Kandy for taking the time to share your experience with me. It has helped me to feel more confident with the treatment I have been given. I guess it is taking me a little time to come to terms with.
Posts.Title: Chemo - Should I have it or not?

Posts.Content: I have recently been diagnosed with Stage 2 breast cancer of the duct (1cm) which had started to spread. I am HER2 negative and my nodes are clear. I had wide incision surgery two months ago March 2018 to remove the cancer and surrounding tissue, followed by radiotherapy. The thought of it coming back is with me a lot of the time and I don't feel "healed". I have lost several relatives through this disease, a Granny, Aunties and cousins (my mother was not affected). I am wondering if I should have a double mastectomy to give me more peace of mind? I want to move forward if possible.
